titles.title: A resolution congratulating the San Jose Earthquakes for winning the 2003 Major League Soccer Cup.
A resolution congratulating the San Jose Earthquakes for winning the 2003 Major League Soccer Cup.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Congratulates the San Jose Earthquakes for winning the 2003 Major League Soccer Cup. Commends the San Jose community for its support of the team and expresses hope that Major League Soccer will continue to inspire fans and young players.
